def solve(n, a, b):
    # Compute j_min and j_max arrays
    j_min = [0]*n
    j_max = [0]*n
    j =0
    for i in range(n):
        while j <n and b[j] < a[i]:
            j +=1
        j_min[i] = j
        j +=1
    # Compute dmin and dmax
    dmin = [0]*n
    dmax = [0]*n
    for i in range(n):
        dmin[i] = b[j_min[i]] - a[i]
        dmax[i] = b[j_max[i]] - a[i]
    return dmin, dmax
